name: algo-viz
description: ## Visualize the execution of your code

scripts.server: export DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run dev --prefix server
scripts.build-client: export DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run create-default --prefix runners/js && python3 runners/python/create_default.py && export REACT_APP_DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix runners/js/builtins
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-all && npm run compile --prefix runners/js/builtins && npm run build-client && npm run build-containers
scripts.build-containers: docker build -t javascript runners/js && docker build -t python runners/python && docker system prune -f
scripts.test: npm run dev && npm test --prefix tests
